p:
The percent encapsulation efficiency (EE%) was determined by the difference between the total amount of essential oil used in the preparation of the sample and the total amount of essential oil in the ultrafiltrate via the following equation:
(3)
E E % =
(
B − A
)
B
∗ 100
where A is the total concentration of essential oil in the ultrafiltrate (mg/mL), and B is the total concentration in the suspension (mg/mL).
